metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5408 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Spring Security versions 5.3.x prior to 5.3.2, 5.2.x prior to 5.2.4, 5.1.x prior to 5.1.10, 5.0.x prior to 5.0.16 and 4.2.x prior to 4.2.16 use a fixed null initialization vector with CBC Mode in the implementation of the queryable text encryptor. A malicious user with access to the data that has been encrypted using such an encryptor may be able to derive the unencrypted values using a dictionary attack.

criterions.comment: libspring-security-2.0-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
